    • Uses of SSRC in de.hshannover.f4.trust.ifmapj

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SSRC IfmapJ.createSsrc(BasicAuthConfig config)
      Create a new SSRC object to operate on the given configuration using basic authentication.
      static SSRC IfmapJ.createSsrc(CertAuthConfig config)
      Create a new SSRC object to operate on the given configuration using certificate based authentication.
      static SSRC IfmapJ.createSsrc(String url, KeyManager[] kms, TrustManager[] tms)
      Deprecated. 
      use createSsrc(CertAuthConfig) instead

      Deprecated. 
      use createSsrc(BasicAuthConfig) instead
      Methods in de.hshannover.f4.trust.ifmapj with parameters of type SSRC 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ClockSkewDetector IfmapJ.createClockSkewDetector(SSRC ssrc, Device dev)
      Create a ClockSkewDetector instance which can be used to synchronize the time with the MAPS.
